data.name: Fell
data.detailed_description:
Fell is a 2d Precision Platformer with a retro 1-bit aesthetic.
Play through multiple unique areas, unlock new color palettes, and use fun movement abilities to conquer levels and make difficult jumps!

You play as BitBoy who fell down a hole and now has to climb back out.
data.about_the_game:

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 30 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
